os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP)

name: FetchPhrase
short_description:
FetchPhrase Shorthand is an "as you type" text-insertion/replacement application that allows users to pair frequently used words, phrases, or sentences with custom shorthand notations. The application monitors keyboard input across Windows programs as you type. When the application recognizes a shorthand notation, it sends the replacement text to the active Windows program, alleviating the needs to retype often-used words, phrases or sentences.

FetchPhrase Shorthand is ideal for medical transcriptionists, healthcare providers, lawyers, or others who frequently reuse words and sentences while typing.

PLEASE NOTE: By its very nature, this application monitors global keyboard input. Some antivirus software that utilize bahavior tracking may flag FetchPhrase Shorthand for "suspcious behavior". If so, and you are uncertain how to add an exception for FetchPhrase Shorthand, or you are concerned about how this application monitors keyboard input, please uninstall this application.
summary: An "as you type" shorthand text-insertion/replacement application.
